title: MP Man Made A Rs 67,490 Payment For His Honda Activa In Coins & It Took 3 Hours To Count It
text:
MP Man Made A Rs 67,490 Payment For His Honda Activa In Coins & It Took 3 Hours To Count It

MP Man Made A Rs 67,490 Payment For His Honda Activa In Coins & It Took 3 Hours To Count It

When it comes to making a payment above Rs 50,000 most of us would reach out for a credit or a debit card.

But there are some people who love making things complicated, like this MP man who literally made the payment for his new Honda Activa in coins.

Source

According to reports, the man named Rakesh Kumar Gupta of Satna (Madhya Pradesh) reached at Krishna Honda Dealership with a bag full of coins.

Gupta was quoted saying, “Like many, Diwali is the biggest auspicious occasion for my family and me. This Dhanteras."

"I had decided to buy Activa 125BSVI to make my daily commuting easier as nothing compares to the legacy of Honda. I am very happy and excited to be a part of this Quiet Revolution."

Gupta wanted to make full payment of the new Honda Activa BSVI of Rs. 67,490 in coins.

The report states that staff at the dealership literally took three hours counting down the coins.

Twitter

In a similar incident two years ago, on the occasion of Bhai Dooj a 13-year-old Yash from Jaipur gifted his sister Rupal a scooty and paid 62 thousand rupees in coins.

The money was from his pocket money that he along with his sister had saved over the years
